content: The 1996 Olympics were full of historic moments, and several memorable events took place at the Georgia Dome. One of those moments was Michael Johnson's 200m race, where he broke the world record and won his second gold medal. Muhammad Ali, one of the greatest boxers of all time, also made a memorable appearance at the opening ceremony of the Olympics. In addition, the Georgia Dome was host to the first-ever Olympic women's soccer tournament, featuring famous players like Mia Hamm, Michelle Akers, and Brandi Chastain. Overall, the 1996 Olympics in Atlanta were full of exciting moments and made significant contributions to Olympic history.
